item.title: Status Update – September 10, 2018
item.description: Still sick, week four! Rain quit, kids had recess but not allowed in grass. Stacy took Webelos to Bedford FD on H St. to learn about First Aid, Opioid Crisis, he asked me questions on way home. Took Dwyane to Scout meeting, games and snacks. Bad fight with Lesa over Ashley again.
